body: I am running late for office hours today. I expect to be on campus in 15 minutes.
This note is bad. I want to delete it.
Good morning students! I'll be here in five minutes.
I am not in my office this week. Please submit homework in Professor Logan's office. I have arranged with him to organize the homework assignments so they don't pile up under my door.
My car broke down on the way here. I am going getting it towed right now and should be on campus in 20 minutes.
Good morning! I am in my office. Just open the door.
I am out for lunch. I'll be back in 5 minutes.
